trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9ContentType class defines the type of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: A classe Pkcs9ContentType define o tipo de conteúdo de uma mensagem CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: A Pkcs9ContentType object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the corresponding signer is not empty.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto Pkcs9ContentType será automaticamente gerado e colocado no <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade sempre que o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o assinante correspondente não está vazia.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9ContentType constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor Pkcs9ContentType cria uma instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property gets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object that contains the content type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade obtém ContentType um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"> </xref> objeto que contém o tipo de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object that contains the content type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"> </xref> objeto que contém o tipo de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType>objeto com especificado <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"> </xref> objeto do qual copiar as informações.
